0.3.name: wordpress/edge-suite
0.3.description:
Upload of compositions through published OAM files. Integrate Adobe Edge Animate compositions seamlessly into your website.

Detailed tutorials on how to install and use Edge Suite can be found here:

  • Edge Docks - written tutorial
  • Adobe TV - video tutorial

More resources can be found at EdgeDocks.com.

The plugin has been intensively tested over the last couple of months and seems to be rather stable, it is up to you though if you want to try and use it in production. If you experience any problems please open an issue in the support section. If you like the plugin please vote for it and let us know that it works for your wordpress version.
